\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 100588}

\subsection*{A Mellow High}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{RickisShalom}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 1600 mg & oral & Pharms - Gabapentin & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 800 mg & oral & Pharms - Metaxalone & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 190.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have chronic pain, and can take 800 mg of gabapentin / day -- once in the morning, and one at bedtime.



I experimented with the drug.  If I take 1600 mg at once, I do get a nice mellow high -- I feel a bit numbed, and nice and relaxed.  



Today, I took 1600 mg along with 800 mg metaxalone (a muscle relaxant).  I feel mellow, and relaxed.  I have some free time.  It will be wonderful to journal and create.  I will most definitely repeat this experience for a nice numbing, yet highly functional state.

\end{document}
